TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET MVC View Content page.

AspNetFile.name: ${Name}.aspx
AspNetFile.FileText: ï»¿<%@ Page Title="" Language="${AspNetLanguage}" Inherits="System.Web.Mvc.ViewPage" %> <asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderID="head" runat="server"> </asp:Content> <asp:Content ID="Content2" ContentPlaceHolderID="MainContent" runat="server"> </asp:Content>
